biography:
Kelly Preston (October 13, 1962 â€“ July 12, 2020) was an American actress and former model. She appeared in more than sixty television and film productions, most notably including Mischief, Twins and Jerry Maguire. She was married to John Travolta, with whom she collaborated on the fantasy film Battlefield Earth. She also starred in the films The Cat in the Hat, Old Dogs, and Broken Bridges.
